articles.title: Astronaut's Eye View: Breathtaking Mars Horizon Captured by NASA's Odyssey Orbiter - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA's Mars Odyssey orbiter has provided new panoramic images of Mars and its moon Phobos, offering fresh insights into the Martian landscape and atmosphere. The Odyssey orbiter captured clouds and dust in the Red Planet’s skies, along with one of its two tin…
articles.content: NASA’s Mars Odyssey orbiter captured stunning images of Mars and its moon Phobos, providing a unique perspective of the planet’s curved landscape and atmosphere. This technical achievement enhances o… [+5465 chars]

articles.title: Who needs a smartwatch? This tech uses your selfie camera to track your health - Android Authority
articles.description: Japanese company NEC has revealed new tech capable of capturing your health metrics via your smartphone's selfie camera.
articles.content:
• Japanese company NEC has revealed the ability to track your well-being via your selfie camera.
